tool_description: Gives positive, negative and neutral sentiments from text.
name: sentiments analysis
title: sentiments analysis

api_list.name: Get sentiments score
api_list.description: Output is between float/decimal value of 0-1 with values near 0.5 indicating neutral sentiments, with 0 being extremely negative and 1 being extremely positive.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiments-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiments-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiments-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiments-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
